title: How to enable the PIN code to lock the screen?
answer:
1Click Settings > Security > Screen lock > PIN. 

2Input the PIN code in the prompt box under " choose your PIN ". 

3Enter the previously entered PIN code again, and click OK to complete the setting of the PIN code. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110063) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110064)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110065) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110066)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110067)

 When clicking the power button or switching on/off the phone, the phone will enter the PIN code unlock interface by default. Enter the set PIN code and click "OK" to unlock the PIN code.
